seed_pair.known: Do you speak Spanish all day?

S0004: how to say something in Spanish
S0005: I'm going to practise speaking with someone else.
Voy a practicar hablar con alguien más.
S0006: I'm trying to remember a word.
S0007: I want to try as hard as I can today.
Quiero intentar tan duro como pueda hoy.
S0008: I'm going to try to explain what I mean.
Voy a intentar explicar lo que quiero decir.
S0009: I speak a little Spanish now.
Hablo un poco de español ahora.
S0010: I'm not sure if I can remember the whole sentence.
No estoy seguro si puedo recordar toda la oración.
S0011: I'd like to be able to speak after you finish.
Me gustaría poder hablar después de que termines.
S0012: I wouldn't like to guess what's going to happen tomorrow.
No me gustaría adivinar lo que va a ocurrir mañana.

seed_context.known: Do you speak Spanish all day?

_instructions.task: Generate 12-15 practice phrases per LEGO using recent seed_pairs as pattern inspiration
_instructions.pattern_matching: Use recent_seed_pairs sentences as natural language pattern examples
_instructions.lego_coverage_requirement: Practice phrases MUST use at least 60% of the LEGOs listed in recent_seed_pairs[seed_id][1]
_instructions.vocabulary_source: Prioritize LEGOs from recent_seed_pairs[seed_id][1] + current_seed_legos_available, then any words from sentences
_instructions.overgeneration: Generate 12-15 phrases knowing some may be filtered by GATE validation
_instructions.quality: Semantic meaning + syntactic correctness + pedagogical value
_instructions.format: Array format: ["English phrase", "Spanish phrase", null, lego_count]
